mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user (user_num, user_photo, user_email, user_passwd, user_Name, user_birth, user_phone, user_postcode, user_addr, user_detailAddr, user_refAddr, user_driveNum, user_key) VALUES (usernum_sequence.nextval, #{user_photo}, #{user_email}, #{user_passwd}, #{user_Name}, #{user_birth}, #{user_phone}, #{user_postcode}, #{user_addr}, #{user_detailAddr}, #{user_refAddr}, #{user_driveNum}, #{ user_key })
INSERT INTO tbl_point (user_num, active_point, total_point) VALUES (#{user_num}, 1000000, 1000000)
mapper.update: INSERT INTO tbl_point (user_num, active_point, total_point) VALUES (#{user_num}, 30000, #{active_point} + #{total_point})
mapper.select: SELECT p.user_num, m.user_email, m.user_Name, m.user_birth, m.user_phone, m.user_regDate ,m.user_driveNum, m.user_type, p.total_point, p.active_point, p.point_date , p.user_grade FROM tbl_user m INNER JOIN tbl_point p ON m.user_num = p.user_num WHERE m.user_active = '1'

SELECT p.user_num, m.user_photo, m.user_email, m.user_Name, m.user_birth, m.user_phone, m.user_postcode, m.user_addr, m.user_detailAddr, m.user_refAddr, m.user_driveNum, m.user_Type, m.user_active, m.user_regDate, p.total_point, p.active_point, p.point_date , p.user_grade FROM tbl_user m INNER JOIN tbl_point p ON m.user_num = p.user_num WHERE m.user_email = #{ user_email } AND m.user_passwd = #{ user_passwd }
